content.description:
Directions: You will now listen to an audio selection. Each selection will be followed by a series of spoken questions based on the content. During the pause, select the best answer to each question from among the four choices.

NOW GET READY TO LISTEN TO THE SELECTION.

choices.label: Es liegen noch keine Ergebnisse vor.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
